document.full_text: since nathan horton was knocked out of the finals with a severe concussion early in game 3, boston has outscored vancouver, 12-1, in tying the series.
document.title: stanley cup finals | bruins 4, canucks 0: horton hit fresh, bruins tie finals
lines_and_colors: since nathan horton was knocked out of the finals with a severe concussion early in game 3, boston has outscored vancouver, 12-1, in tying the series.
